text: But when ambassadors of the rulers of Babylon came to him to ask about the miraculous sign32:31. See verse 24. that had happened in the country, God left him to test him, so he could know Hezekiah's true thinking.32:31. This is surely in reference to Hezekiah's previous pride and failure to acknowledge God's miracle on his behalf Here in human language we see God making sure Hezekiah is no longer proud.
